expo.name: recipe-dex
expo.description:
A digital recipe storage solution. Add your own recipes manually, or download them from the internet and save them to your phone.

Currently known to work on these recipe sites:
- allrecipes.com
- foodnetwork.com
- tasty.co
- food.com
- yummly.com
- thepioneerwoman.com
- epicurious.com
- bettycrocker.com
- eatingwell.com
- delish.com
